findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The contracts manage_FeeExempt, manage_TxLimitExempt, and manage_WalletLimitExempt have external functions with authorized access control, which can lead to potential unauthorized script upgrades.

findings.title: Unprotected external function calls
findings.description: The contract makes unprotected external function calls which can lead to reentrancy attacks.

findings.title: Lack of access control for sensitive functions
findings.description: Some functions are accessible without proper access control, potentially leading to unauthorized actions.

findings.title: Centralization Risk
findings.description: Active contract ownership identified, which can lead to centralization related risks such as rug pull scams.

findings.title: Risk of unlimited token minting
findings.description: The smart contract owner has the ability to authorize a wallet to modify 'write contract' parameters and change max transaction limit and max wallet limit, which can lead to unlimited token minting.
